name.ja: <ruby>心の友だち<rt>エンドレス・パートナー</rt></ruby>

effect.en: Ritual Summon an EARTH Attribute Galaxy Type monster with a different name from the monsters used as material by shuffling face-up Galaxy Type monsters from your field into the owner's Deck as material whose total Levels equal the Level of the monster you Ritual Summon. Then, you can send cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard, up to [the number of monsters used as material by this effect].
